selected_links.title: Report a missed bin or box collection
strengths: Direct link to report a missed bin or box collection
Provides form to report the issue
selected_links.reasoning: This link directly provides a form for users to report a missed bin or box collection, making it the most relevant to the customer information needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially addresses this need
Reason.reasoning: Although the content does provide a means for reporting a missed bin or box collection, there is no explicit mention of what to do when a bin was not put out, which might lead some residents like myself to think it doesn't apply in this case. I would have preferred if the website explained specifically what actions I should take when I forget to put my bin out.
Reason.next_actions: I will report the missed collection by going through the provided reporting process as best as I can understand, and mentioning that I forgot to put the bin out in the description.

analysis.overall_assessment: While the content provides a means for reporting missed collections, it does not offer a detailed explanation of how to handle minor oversights like forgetting to put a bin out. This creates some confusion among residents. To improve, the website could provide more detailed instructions and clarify common situations that might require reporting.
